seo: Enter the prompt here to be used in the mode for generating SEO-focused alt text.
a11y: Enter the prompt here to be used in the mode for generating accessibility-focused alt text.

video.standard: Enter the prompt here to analyze the content of a video tag and generate an aria-label.
video.detailed: Enter the prompt here to analyze the content of a video tag and generate detailed text explaining its content.

context: Enter the prompt here to help the model understand the text information {surroundingText} around {mediaType} tags.
